metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a member of Gur Tribe at Cazador's Palace
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Gur Follow UpApproach the Gur Leader, a dialog will be started.After the dialog ends you can click on any individual Gur.

0.speaker: Pumler Grejit
0.text: If Cazador had become what he intended to be, he could have torn this city apart. Thanks to you, that won't happen.

1.speaker: Pumler Grejit
1.text: Although the chances of something else destroying Baldur's Gate seem quite high.

2.speaker: Pumler Grejit
2.text: Anyone capable of killing a vampire as powerful as Cazador has my respect. But you are not a true hunter.

3.speaker: Pumler Grejit
3.text: Sparing the spawns was an error. Releasing them was an act of madness.

4.speaker: Pumler Grejit
4.text: It is good that Cazador's reign is ended. But you should have killed those wretched creatures along with their master.

5.speaker: Pumler Grejit
5.text: This lair is cleansed - no trace of Cazador remains. You are a true hunter.

6.speaker: Pumler Grejit
6.text: You can leave. We'll make sure nothing remains but dust, and bad memories.
